quiz.question: What is a good practice for saving money on groceries?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Create a shopping list, B - Buy everything on sale, C - Shop when hungry

quiz.question: How can you effectively save for a vacation?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Save small amounts regularly, B - Wait until the last minute, C - Use a credit card

quiz.question: What is a recommended method to save on utility bills?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Keep lights on in empty rooms, B - Use energy-efficient appliances, C - Ignore the bills

quiz.question: Which of the following is a smart saving strategy?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Set up an automatic transfer to savings, B - Spend all your paycheck, C - Only save when you have extra money

quiz.question: What should you consider when creating a budget?
quiz.answerDescription: A - All income and expenses, B - Only fixed expenses, C - Just expenses

quiz.question: How can you save money on dining out?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Always order the most expensive item, B - Use coupons or discounts, C - Never look at the menu prices

quiz.question: What is one way to avoid impulse purchases?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Make a list before shopping, B - Go shopping without a plan, C - Buy things that are on display

quiz.question: What is a good way to save on transportation costs?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Use public transportation or bike, B - Always drive, C - Take taxis frequently

quiz.question: What is a practical way to save on entertainment expenses?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Go to every event, B - Look for free or low-cost activities, C - Only stay home

quiz.question: What should you do to keep track of your spending?
quiz.answerDescription: A - Use a budgeting app or spreadsheet, B - Keep all receipts without reviewing them, C - Forget about tracking expenses
